DESCRIPTION: Calculates the square root of a number.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Sqr Example</h3> <p>Returns the square root of a positive number. <p>Sqr(2): <cfoutput>#Sqr(2)#</cfoutput> <p>Sqr(Abs(-144)): <cfoutput>#Sqr(Abs(-144))#</cfoutput> <p>Sqr(25^2): <cfoutput>#Sqr(25^2)#</cfoutput>
USAGE: The value in number must be greater than or equal to 0.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A positive integer or a variable that contains one. Number whose square root to get.
